EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Josh, The bank account number we have on file for your account was rejected by the bank. Can you log in and update it by clicking on “payroll” (top grey menu) and then “direct deposit” (left menu bar.) Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. Subject: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Josh N. Greenberg (20913)- prenote rejection Hello Sara, We received a message from the bank that Josh’s pre-note rejected. Please work with him to get this fixed. Thanks, ADP has received notification from your employee's bank that a direct deposit pre-note item has been rejected. Corrections to your employee's bank information are necessary in order for the employee to receive a direct deposit in the future. Changes are required when the bank receives invalid account numbers, incorrect transaction (deduction) codes, account number changes or amendments due to bank mergers and acquisitions.
The details for the rejected pre-note items by employee, with reason for return are outlined below.
File no Type RR Check Date Return Code Description 020913 PREN R03 05/11/2012 No Account ___________________________________
